abstract_summ: The influence of media coverage in online searches may hamper the role of Google Trends (GT) for Covid-19 monitoring . Rises and peaks in "coronavirus" searches were similar in time in 17 different assessed countries, irrespectively of their epidemic situation . In 15 of these countries, rises in "anosmia" and "ageusia" GT occurred in the same week or one week after they were identified in the media as symptoms of COVID-19 .
